import React from 'react' import FillForm from './FillForm' import Estados from './Estados' import CasaAp from './CasaAp' import LastJob from './LastJob' class FieldSet extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.form = this.form.bind(this) this.state = { nome: '', email: '', cpf: '', endereco: '', cidade: '', estado: '', tipo: '', curriculo: '', cargo:'', } } form({ target }) { const { name, value } = target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (
) } } export default FieldSet
